structure.unit: Transportation Facilities, Highway Systems And Urban Development Plans

law.catch_line: Bonds; Issuance Authorized; Limitations; Terms; Requirements; Conditions; Rules And Regulations For Assistance To Private Companies; Disbursement Of Proceeds

text.section: To acquire by purchase or otherwise, plan, design, construct, reconstruct, alter, recondition and improve for lease to any eligible private company, mass transportation facilities and equipment.
To pay any capital costs of the authority, whether or not bonds for any such purchase may also be issued under clause (1).
